message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%.  We can work from there.
That's too greedy Alice. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or let's see what happens next.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is still too lopsided. Let's meet in the middle at 65/35.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it before inflation eats away at both our shares!
